MISSING_SKILLS: Big Data Technologies (Spark, Hadoop, Hive, Presto)
RESUME_TIPS: Emphasize experience with **machine learning model deployment** and monitoring to align with MLOps requirements mentioned in the job description, highlighting practical experience.
Explicitly mention experience with **TensorFlow, PyTorch, or Keras** in the skills section, as these are highlighted in the job description as preferred qualifications.
Add details regarding experience with **cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, or GCP**, and related ML services like SageMaker, Azure ML, or Google AI Platform.
Include specific projects or experiences where **A/B testing or causal inference** were applied, demonstrating a solid foundation in statistical analysis.
Incorporate hands-on experience with **big data technologies like Spark, Hadoop, Hive, or Presto**, showcasing ability to work with large datasets.
Detail any experience with **MLOps practices and tools, such as MLflow, Kubeflow, Docker, and CI/CD pipelines**, to showcase expertise in model deployment and monitoring.
Showcase experience with **data visualization tools like Tableau or Power BI** in the skills section or project descriptions to highlight proficiency in communicating insights effectively.
Include projects that demonstrate expertise in **building predictive models or conducting A/B testing** to match the key responsibilities outlined in the job description.
Revise the experience section to use action verbs that better quantify achievements and contributions, such as **'Developed', 'Implemented', 'Improved'**, etc., to showcase impact.
Incorporate the phrase "**communication skills**" and provide specific examples of how these skills were used to translate technical findings for non-technical audiences.

Deep Learning.DESCRIPTION: Covers the foundations of Deep Learning, teaches how to build neural networks, and how to lead successful machine learning projects. Includes CNNs, RNNs, and LSTMs.

Deep Learning.COURSE_NAME: Deep Learning A-Z™: Hands-On Artificial Neural Networks
Deep Learning.DESCRIPTION: Learn to create Deep Learning Algorithms in Python from two Machine Learning & Data Science Experts. Uses TensorFlow, Keras, etc.
A series that teaches you to build neural networks from scratch using Python, offering a deeper understanding of the underlying mechanisms.

Cloud Platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP).DESCRIPTION: Prepares you for the AWS Machine Learning certification, covering a broad range of AWS ML services and how to implement them.
Learn to build, deploy, and manage machine learning solutions using Microsoft Azure Machine Learning service.
A comprehensive course covering various aspects of Google Cloud Platform, including machine learning services.

Big Data Technologies (Spark, Hadoop, Hi.DESCRIPTION: Learn about the tools used to manage, analyze, and leverage big data. Includes Hadoop, Spark, and MapReduce.

An introductory tutorial to Hadoop, covering its architecture, components, and basic operations.

MLflow.DESCRIPTION: This specialization introduces MLOps concepts and covers tools like MLflow for managing the ML lifecycle.
Offered by Databricks, this course covers how to use MLflow to track experiments, package code, and deploy models.
A practical tutorial on using MLflow for experiment tracking and model management.

Kubeflow.DESCRIPTION: Learn how to build and deploy machine learning pipelines on Kubernetes using Kubeflow.
A practical guide to Kubeflow, covering model deployment and management on Kubernetes.
A tutorial series on setting up and using Kubeflow for machine learning workflows.

Docker.COURSE_NAME: Docker and Kubernetes: The Complete Guide
Docker.DESCRIPTION: Learn how to deploy applications using Docker and Kubernetes, covering containerization and orchestration.
Focuses on using docker to create reproducible Data Science Environments
A beginner-friendly introduction to Docker, covering basic concepts and commands.

CI/CD pipelines.DESCRIPTION: Learn to automate software delivery pipelines using Git, Jenkins, and Docker.
Learn about DevOps practices and tools on AWS, including CI/CD pipelines and automation.
A practical tutorial on building CI/CD pipelines using popular tools.
